ingredients.name: Taco Bell Original Thick 'N Chunky Salsa

steps.step: Cut up Velveeta Cheese into small pieces. Crush Tortilla Chips into small pieces. Cut Tomato into small pieces. Mince Green Onion
Brown Ground Beef in a larget skillet on medium-high heat. Drain
Stir in 2 3/4 cups of Water, Salsa, and Chili Powder. Bring to a boil. Stir in Macaroni and cover. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until water is almost absorbed
Add Velveeta Cheese and cook until melted, stirring frequently. Garnish with crushed Tortilla Chips, Tomato, and Green Onion
